ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken?
What is your overall assessment of this course?
Do you expect to use this class for credit toward your major, or toward a pre-professional program?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize ECON 110 05 for a fellow student? Would you recommend ECON 110 05 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Mandatory class. Sit and give presentations on your research! Fun. Get started early. FIGURE OUT YOUR SENIOR ESSAY TOPIC EARLY OR YOU WILL GET CRUNCHED AT THE END OF THE SEMESTER AND NEVER WRITE AN AWESOME PAPER. Don't screw it up. Get it together!
I guess anyone reading this review is a cogsci major, so yes! take directed research!
Directed Research in cognitive science allows you to do independent study with a Yale faculty member. The experience will vary widely depending on which faculty member you work with.
Fantastic opportunity to conduct actual research. Experience entirely depends on the professor with whom you work.
This is the perfect course to take if you are interested in gaining research experience.
